item.title: Man From Estonia
item.author: noisytoot@gmail.com (Noisytoot)
item.description: There was once was a man from Estonia Who said he had never felt lonelier Then he went to UK And since was OK That ex-lonely man from Estonia

item.title: Person From Tallinn
item.author: noisytoot@gmail.com (Noisytoot)
item.description: There was once a person from Tallinn Who didn't much care for old Stalin He/she logged into root And started to toot That musical person from Tallinn
